isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - HEADER CONSOLE PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Install Header Console Panel on Daycab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 85
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Place header console panel (Item 2) inside the cab across the top of the dash panel.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 86
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Install six retaining clips with ty-wraps (Item 8) with the wiring harness (Item 9) back onto the tabs of the header console panel (Item 10).
Connect wiring harness connector (Item 4) to driver side speaker (Item 5).
Connect wiring harness connector (Item 6) to passenger side speaker (Item 7).
Connect wiring harness connector (Item 1) to pig tail connector (Item 3) of electronic control panel (Item 2), if so equipped.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 85
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Lift header console panel (Item 2) off the dash panel. Position the front of the header console panel at cab header just above windshield. Line up the three mounting hooks (Item 8) of the header console panel with the slots in the cab header. Slide the header console panel forward securing the three mounting hooks into the slots in the cab header. Raise the back of header console panel up to the headliner trim panel and line up plastic alignment tab (Item 9) with the slot in the headliner trim panel and cab header. Carefully push the two retaining clips (Item 7) of header console panel through slots in the headliner trim panel and into cab header until they snap in place.
Install two torx head screws (Item 5) near driver side speaker through header console panel (Item 2) and headliner trim panel into cab header. Tighten to 20 to 24.5 Lbf-in (2.3 to 2.8 N•m).
Install two torx head screws (Item 6) near passenger side speaker through header console panel (Item 2) and headliner trim panel into cab header. Tighten to 20 to 24.5 Lbf-in (2.3 to 2.8 N•m).

Install two torx head screws (Item 4) inside cavity for courtesy light (Item 1) through header console panel (Item 2) and headliner trim panel into cab header. Tighten to 20 to 24.5 Lbf-in (2.3 to 2.8 N•m).
Connect wiring harness connector (Item 3) to courtesy light (Item 1).
Position courtesy light (Item 1) into header console panel (Item 2), push it in until it snaps into place.

Install sun visor and clip, refer to
SUN VISOR AND CLIP
.

svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 8
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Line up retaining clips of passenger side A pillar trim panel (Item 5) with slots in the cab A pillar (Item 8). Carefully push retaining clips of passenger side A pillar trim panel into slots in the cab A pillar until it snaps in place.

Position passenger side grab handle (Item 6) in place on passenger side A pillar trim panel (Item 5). Install two hex flanged bolts (Item 4) through passenger side A pillar trim panel into cab A pillar (Item 8). Tighten to 77 to 95 Lbf-in (8.7 to 10.7 N•m).

Line up retaining clips (Item 9) of driver side A pillar trim panel (Item 1) with slots in the cab A pillar (Item 3). Carefully push retaining clips of driver side A pillar trim panel into slots in the cab A pillar until it snaps in place.
